name: 炼金：洛温暗影笼罩
description: 炼金：洛温暗影笼罩共30张卡牌，将于2026年2月4日上线万智牌：竞技场。感谢轻脚翻译并制作中文卡图。

cards.name: The Grand Goatnapper
cards.text:
Spells you cast have `affinity for Goats`.
{T}: Target non-Goat creature `perpetually` becomes a Goat in addition to its other types. Then `conjure` a card named `Goatnap:0` into your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
FLAVOR
"Fear the boggart in sheep's clothing"
—Emerging kithkin proverb
cards.zhs_text:
你施放的咒语具有`山羊共鸣`。
{T}：目标非山羊生物`永久`成为山羊，且仍具有原本类别。然后将一张名称为`顺手牵羊:0`的牌`幻变`进你的手牌。只能于法术时机起动。
FLAVOR
「小心披着羊皮的波尬。」
～洁英新谚

cards.name: Providence of Night
cards.text:
`Protection from monocolored`
Whenever you cast a spell with hybrid mana in its mana cost, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
FLAVOR
"I have seen beyond the moonlight. I have seen the infinite night. It does not creep, it has no need. It is already here."
—The Listener's Lament
cards.zhs_text:
`反单色保护`
每当你施放法术力费用中包含混血法术力的咒语时，将它复制。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。
FLAVOR
「我已窥透月华，也已望穿永夜。它不匍行，无需匍行。它已降临。」
～聆者悲歌
